dialog.text: I am not much of a fighter, but I am skilled as a strategist. Please let me join you.

prompt.next_dialog: I'll be here when you're ready for my help.

dialog.text: I am not much of a fighter, but I am skilled as a strategist. Please let me join you.

prompt.next_dialog: I'll be here when you're ready for my help.

dialog.text: Anti Nephi Lehi: Helaman, son of Alma, is in the large home and wishes to speak with you.

I am Anti Nephi Lehi, son of Mathoni and brother of Lamoni. Our people now call ourselves the Anti Nephi Lehies, and I took upon myself the same name. This name reminds us that, although we are not descendants of Nephi, we are still descendants of our shared forefather Lehi, and we wish to follow his example and not that of our forefathers Laman and Lemuel. Thank you so much for offering this land to our people. Helaman, son of Alma, is in the large home and wishes to speak with you.

ai_sprite.name: villager3
ai_sprite.dialog: We're calling ourselves Anti Nephi Lehies, but that name is confusing and a mouthful. Since Ammon was an integral part of our conversion and deliverance, some of us are starting to call ourselves the people of Ammon.

ai_sprite.name: villager3
ai_sprite.dialog: We aren't wasting any time in building and farming.

ai_sprite.name: villager3
ai_sprite.dialog: This is the land of Jershon. Welcome, and thank you for protecting us.

ai_sprite.name: villager3
ai_sprite.dialog: There is a vast wilderness north of here, after which is the seashore, where the cities of Morianton, Lehi, and Nephihah reside.

ai_sprite.name: villager3
ai_sprite.dialog: We buried our weapons of war deep in the ground.

dialog.text: Helaman is waiting for us at Antiparah? We'll head there right away. Thank you!
